title: My prepaid card doesnt working
body:
We apologize, but the store is unable to process your payment at this time. Please wait a few minutes and try again. If this problem persists, please contact us at http://support.leagueoflegends.com/.

This is what came out first time when i tried but some hours later same Thing :/

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you still experiencing this issue?

Have you [submitted a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support?
